name: PaymentReconciliation
title: PaymentReconciliation
description: This resource provides the details including amount of a payment and allocates the payment items being paid.

elements.name: PaymentReconciliation
elements.description: This resource provides the details including amount of a payment and allocates the payment items being paid.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A unique identifier assigned to this payment reconciliation.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: period
elements.description: The period of time for which payments have been gathered into this bulk payment for settlement.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date when the resource was created.

elements.name: paymentIssuer
elements.description: The party who generated the payment.

elements.name: requestor
elements.description: The practitioner who is responsible for the services rendered to the patient.

elements.name: outcome
elements.description: The outcome of a request for a reconciliation.

elements.name: disposition
elements.description: A human readable description of the status of the request for the reconciliation.

elements.name: paymentDate
elements.description: The date of payment as indicated on the financial instrument.

elements.name: paymentAmount
elements.description: Total payment amount as indicated on the financial instrument.

elements.name: paymentIdentifier
elements.description: Issuer's unique identifier for the payment instrument.

elements.name: detail
elements.description: Distribution of the payment amount for a previously acknowledged payable.

elements.name: formCode
elements.description: A code for the form to be used for printing the content.

elements.name: processNote
elements.description: A note that describes or explains the processing in a human readable form.
